name: Manclone Ancient Hero Demo
description:
--}[Story in nutshell]{--

 your island has been invaded by unknown robots from the surface. clones decided to run away but our hero stays and fights back to get his homeland back!

--}(GamePlay){--

it is a fresh change in the boomer shooter genre and inspired by 

MegaMan x games

you have abilities like hovering in the air, in Air boost & wall climbing.

you have 5 guns never get out of ammo but they need to get recharged,

--}=Big Note={--

I need feedback for my game so any idea you have I appreciate that. it has a very short and bad tutorial so please play the game more than one time. 

==}about demo{==

it has 3 levels with 2 bonus levels. 

E, 3, 2, 1, Q  are the weapons ( I planed only 5 guns in the game ...)

C or Ctrl is for gliding in the air 

F or right Mouse  key is in Air boost

p and o change levels 

and there is no save systems (levels are so short there is no need for save)

/* Warning*\

you should have GPU strong as GTX 1050 ti and  my CPU  strong as Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
